hero.paragraph: Empowering you with simple guidance and safe access.

section1.paragraph: If you already have a government form (photo or PDF),you can upload it here to identify the form and get guidance.
section1.note: We do not store your file. This is only for guidance.

section4.paragraph: Please read these points carefully before filling any government form.

ul.li1: Use only official government websites ending with .gov.in.
ul.li2: Keep Aadhaar, Bank Passbook and ID proofs ready.
ul.li3: Check spelling of your name and date of birth carefully.
ul.li4: Save screenshots or photocopies after submission.
ul.li5: Ask a trusted family member if you feel unsure.

ul.li1: Do not share OTP, PIN or bank details with anyone.
ul.li2: Do not pay agents who promise quick approval.
ul.li3: Do not click unknown links sent via SMS or WhatsApp.
ul.li4: Do not fill forms on unofficial websites.

ul.li1: Most government services are free of cost.
ul.li2: Approval may take time — delays are normal.
ul.li3: Government never asks for money over phone calls.
ul.li4: Always verify website address before entering details.

guidance-list.note: If you feel confused at any step, stop and take help from a trusted person or visit a nearby government help center.
